title: Examining Authenticity
description:
Luke wanted to talk about one of the things that stood out to him in Julian and Nick's "Zeitgeist" ConverZation.  Here's how that turned out.

Nick and Julian's first converZation on Zeitgeist:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xrvm2HkS1jg&t=1s
